page.title: 15ST. JOSEPH'S R.C. SCHOOL
page.content: St. Joseph's Infant and Junior School is a Catholic school.The school was built in 1930 with the latest additions being made in 1979.There are 11 teachers at the school.The Headmistress is Sister Monica and there are 2 other nuns who teach at the school.There is only one male teacher. The school has a uniform, which is red tie, navy jumper and white shirt or blouse.There are about 290 pupils at the school and they come from a much wider area than most schools. Some come from E.Tilbury by school bus.The reason for this is that St. Joseph's is the only Catholic school in this area.The Infant school has 4 classrooms.In our survey the most popular subjects taught were Art, Computer work and Clay.
